text: The discography of American nu metal band Korn consists of 13 studio albums, three live albums, eight compilation albums, seven video albums, three extended plays, 45 singles, ten promotional singles and 49 music videos. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected chart positions and certifications !
